flawed_nl_solution:
He consumes 2500+1000=<<2500+1000=3500>>3500 calories on Saturday
He consumes 2500*6+3500=<<2500*6+3500=18500>>18500 calories in the week.
He burns 3000*7=<<3000*7=20100>>20100 calories in the week
His caloric deficit is 20100-18500=<<20100-18500=1600>>1600 calories per week
#### 1600

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 21000, not 20100. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
